sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:storage: Store at -80℃. Thaw just before use and keep on ice.

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: mCherry
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: mCherry
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:product: monomeric derivative of DsRed fluorescent protein (Shaner et al., 2004)

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:pricing: $350 USD for preparation of 100 µL virus + $30 USD for plasmid.
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:modificationsToBackbone: Addition of a CaMKIIa promoter and a WPRE
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refBib: Principles for applying optogenetic tools derived from direct comparative analysis of microbial opsins. Mattis J, Tye KM, Ferenczi EA, Ramakrishnan C, O'Shea DJ, Prakash R, Gunaydin LA, Hyun M, Fenno LE, Gradinaru V, Yizhar O, Deisseroth K. Nat Methods. 2011 Dec 18;9(2):159-72. doi: 10.1038/nmeth.1808. 10.1038/nmeth.1808 PubMed 22179551
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:purpose: AAV expression of CaMKIIa-driven hChR2 variant CheTA 2.0 for ultrafast optogenetic control.

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: Factor Xa site
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:product: Factor Xa recognition and cleavage site

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refMethod: pAAV-CaMKIIa-hChR2(E123A)-mCherry was a gift from Karl Deisseroth (Addgene plasmid # 35506 ; http://n2t.net/addgene:35506 ; RRID:Addgene_35506) For viral preps, please replace (Addgene plasmid # 35506) in the above sentence with: (Addgene viral prep # 35506-AAV9)

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: AmpR
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: confers resistance to ampicillin, carbenicillin, and related antibiotics
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: AmpR

sbol:ComponentDefinition.dcterms:description: AAV expression of CaMKIIa-driven hChR2 variant CheTA 2.0 for ultrafast optogenetic control..
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:shipment: Viral particles are shipped frozen on dry ice. Plasmid DNA (≥ 200ng) will also be included in the shipment.
